description: Erection of a side extension at first floor level to the northern elevation of 39 Phillimore Gardens to include the repositioning of the previously consented extract within an acoustic enclosure. Plans also include works previously considered for the construction of a basement with frontlight wells and roof lights to the rear: erection of rear lower ground floor extension and rear upper ground floor conservatory; provision of new landscaping; alterations to front portico and lower ground floor window openings; inner butterfly roof replaced with concealed roof terrace at main roof level; insertion of slim line conservation roof lights to rear main roof; all remaining timber sash and casement windows to be re-placed with timber slimline double glazed units; air extract acoustic louvre enclosures on flat roofs to north and south side extensions replacing existing exposed extract ducts; provision of a side extension to the southern flank wall to house plant along with the provision of a condenser unit within an acoustic enclosure within the front, southern light well and the removal of the front bow window and replacement with a new bow window.
